data.message: Just bought a promotional bottle in my local shop and there's no code on the bottle top or inside the label 😒

replies.message: Hi Nadine, we're sorry to see this. Please could you PM us with the production info from the neck of the bottle, so we can look into this for you. Thanks

I know sir Lanka people as I work with them In my co op store. I would love to win a trip to cape town as I keep buying coca cola bottles saying cape town. Would be an interesting experience for me. The taste of cape town.

I've hard of cape town. My dream holiday would be cape town. I don't even know how to enter. South Africa Cape Town. I've been to new York City in 200. And Irland Dublin. Cape Town looks more interesting
Hi Lucy, please visit: http://spr.ly/61818YTkH for all the info about the promotion and for details on how to enter. Thanks
